title: FTC Investigating Facebook, U.S. Expels Russians, Data Fueling Analytics
itunes:title: FTC Investigating Facebook, U.S. Expels Russians, Data Fueling Analytics
description:
Sarah Frier, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, discusses Facebook being investigated by the Federal Trade Commission. Jennifer Epstein, Bloomberg News White House Reporter, explains why the U.S. has ordered 60 Russian diplomats to leave the country. Dean Stoecker, CEO of Alteryx, breaks down the end-to-end analytics platform for enterprise. Tobias Levkovich, Chief U.S. Equity Strategist at Citigroup, discusses a changing tenor in the markets. Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his "Chart of the Day" on GE falling behind the FANG stocks. And Katherine Chiglinsky, Bloomberg News Finance Reporter, talks about Amazon’s Alexa coming to Wall Street. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
